themes: The evolution of sound in popular music
Influence of technology on music production
Impact of electronic instruments on culture
quotes: the 808 is everywhere. You may or may not know it by name, but you've heard it before.
that was what was in our mind at the time. Where it went to, needless to say, is someplace quite different.
summaries.full_summary: The Roland TR-808 drum machine transformed popular music with its innovative sound design, particularly in hip-hop and electronic genres. This episode explores the evolution of bass-heavy music, from lack of audible low-pitched sounds to the booming drums that define modern pop.
